attributes.action: get rid of all university tutition fees.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Young adults deserve a free education so why do you have to pay to go to university. If the goverment wants what is best then should they not be helping people in education like scotland. Also people who go to university get an average of £6000 a year more money so the university fees will be paid in tax over the next few years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
